text: Arabia is a 1995 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Jayaraj, starring Babu Antony, Charmila and Anusha in the lead roles.http://spicyonion.com/title/arabia-malayalam-movie/ ==Plot== The place Dharmapuri has a very poor king who loves peace and happiness for his people. But nearby Kalabai wants to take away Dharmapuri from the king and people. Kalabai gives false evidence and gets permission from Sarkar. And Kalabai gives one week time for the king and people to run away from Dharmapuri. Now comes Babu Antony as a merchant from Arabia. Actually, Babu's father was leader who was killed by Kalabai. Babu has now come to take revenge for his father's death. The film ends with Babu killing Kalabai and establishing peace. ==Cast== *Babu Antony as Akbar Ali *Anusha as Bhairavi *Madhupal as Salim *Charmila as Sindoori *Augustine as H. C. Gopal Gowda *Geetha Vijayan as Seba *V. K. Sreeraman as Dharmapuri's King *K. R. Savithri as Bhairavi's mother *Hakim Rawther as Usthad Hakim *Kaduvakulam Antony as P. C. Velapp *Antony Thekkek as Zapher Ali *Eliyas Babu as Raja Purahithan Devanna *Sabnam as Laila *Krishnaprasad as Villager *Manuraj as Villager == Soundtrack == ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Arabia (film)
